get.summary: Get Bulk collection of KPI metrics for all instances of a specified Category for the lastAvailable timestamp
get.description: This endpoint will return a bulk collection of KPI metrics for a specified Category for the last available timestamp"

get.summary: List Categories and associated KPI Metrics
get.description: This endpoint will return a collection of possible categories for the selected system and their associated KPI metrics
This call queries for the list of Storage Groups for a selected System
This call queries for the list of Volumes for a selected System
